languages.text: "Ваш Омниссия не говорит с вами, потому вы блуждаете во тьме. Обратись к свету Императора, истинный бог укажет тебе, что грех, а что — благодать".
"Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."
languages.original_text: "Ваш Омниссия не говорит с вами, потому вы блуждаете во тьме. Обратись к свету Императора, истинный бог укажет тебе, что грех, а что — благодать".

traits.locale_text: "Your Omnissiah doesn't speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way sin lies and which way grace lies."
"Your Omnissiah doesn't speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way sin lies and which way grace lies."
"Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way sin lies and which way grace lies."
"Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way sin lies and which way grace lies."
"Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."

languages.text: “你的欧姆尼塞亚不会与你交谈，所以你才会在黑暗中徘徊。拥抱帝皇的光芒吧，让真神告诉你哪条路代表罪恶，哪条路代表美德。”
languages.original_text: "Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."

traits.locale_text: “你的欧姆尼塞亚不会与你交谈，所以你才会在黑暗中徘徊。拥抱帝皇的光芒吧，让真神告诉你哪条路是善，哪条路是恶。”

languages.text: «Su Omnissiah no le habla, y por eso vaga en la oscuridad. Acepte la luz del Emperador y el dios verdadero le enseñará qué camino conduce a la condena y cuál a la gracia».
languages.original_text: "Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."

traits.locale_text: «Su Omnissiah no le habla, y por eso vaga en la oscuridad. Acepte la luz del Emperador y el dios verdadero le enseñará qué camino conduce al pecado y cuál a la gracia».

languages.text: 「万機神がお前に語りかけないがために、お前は暗闇の中をさまよっているのだ。皇帝の光を受け入れよ。そうすれば、真の神がお前に、天罰がどちらにあり、恵みがどちらにあるかを教えてくださるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神がお前に語りかけないがために、お前は暗闇の中をさまよっているのだ。皇帝の光を受け入れよ。そうすれば、真の神がお前に、天罰がどちらにあり、恵みがどちらにあるかを教えてくださるだろう」

languages.text: "Euer Omnissiah spricht nicht mit Euch, daher irrt Ihr durch die Dunkelheit. Öffnet Euch dem Licht des Imperators, dann wird der wahre Gott Euch zeigen, welcher Pfad zur Verdammnis führt und welcher zur Erlösung."
languages.original_text: "Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Omnissiah spricht nicht mit Euch, daher irrt Ihr durch die Dunkelheit. Öffnet Euch dem Licht des Imperators, dann wird der wahre Gott Euch zeigen, welcher Pfad zur Sünde führt und welcher zur Erlösung."

languages.text: « Votre Omnimessie ne vous parle pas, alors vous errez dans les ténèbres. Acceptez la lumière de l'Empereur, et le Dieu véritable vous montrera où se cache la damnation et où réside la grâce. »
languages.original_text: "Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Omnimessie ne vous parle pas, alors vous errez dans les ténèbres. Acceptez la lumière de l'Empereur, et le Dieu véritable vous montrera où se cache le péché et où réside la grâce. »

languages.text: "Hermesih'in seninle konuşmuyor, sen de karanlıkta kör gözlerle dolaşıyorsun. İmparator'un ışığına kucak aç ki gerçek Tanrı; hangi yolun lanete, hangi yolun fazilete gittiğini sana göstersin."
languages.original_text: "Your Omnissiah does not speak to you, so you wander about in the dark. Embrace the light of the Emperor, and the true God will show you which way damnation lies and which way grace lies."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'in seninle konuşmuyor, sen de karanlıkta kör gözlerle dolaşıyorsun. İmparator'un ışığına kucak aç ve hangi yolun lanete, hangi yolun fazilete gittiğini sana gerçek Tanrı göstersin."
